content: baby hat by teomakes sizes s - 3-6 months 35 cm m - 6-12 months 40 cm l - 12+ months 45 cm gauge 22 sts x 30 row - 10x10cm abbreviations st/sts - stitch/stitches k - knit p - purl yo - yarn over materials k2tog - knit two together circular needles 3 5mm yarn - hobbycraft hey baby 50g 1 skein ssk - slip slip knit together through the 1 stitch marker back loop 2 dpns size 3 5mm tapestry needle r - row/round using the long tail cast on 65 76 87 part 1 - scalloped edge r1-3 - knit all stitches r4 - k5 *k2tog k3 yo k1 yo k3 ssk* repeat 5 6 7 times k5 r5 7 9 11 - knit all sts r6 - k5 *k2tog k2 yo k3 yo k2 ssk* repeat 5 6 7 times k5 r8 - k5 *k2tog k1 yo k5 yo k1 ssk* repeat 5 6 7 times k5 r10 -k5 *k2tog yo k7 yo ssk* repeat 5 6 7 times k5 part 2 - stockinette starting on the right side of the work knit as follows r1 - knit al sts r2 - k5 purl to 5sts left k5 repeat r1&r2 until the work measures 10 11 12 cm from the beginning of stockinette part 3 - cast on and work in the round knit all stitches and when you get to the end of the row don t turn the work but cast on 4 sts and join in the round placing a marker knit 1 round of plain stockinette part 4 - the crown decreases size s decreases size m r1 - k8 k2tog x 6 k7 k2tog r1 - k8 k2tog x 8 r2 - k7 k2tog x 6 k6 k2tog r2 - k7 k2tog x 8 r3 - k6 k2tog x 6 k5 k2tog r3 - k6 k2tog x 8 r4 - k5 k2tog x 6 k4 k2tog r4 - k5 k2tog x 8 r5 - k4 k2tog x 6 k3 k2tog r5 - k4 k2tog x 8 r6 - k3 k2tog x 6 k2 k2tog r6 - k3 k2tog x 8 r7 - k2 k2tog x 6 k1 k2tog r7 - k2 k2tog x 8 r8 - k1 k2tog x 6 k2tog r8 - k1 k2tog x 8 r9 - k2tog x 6 k1 7sts r9 - k2tog x 8 8sts decreases size l r1 - k8 k2tog x 8 k5 k2tog r5 - k4 k2tog x 8 k1 k2tog r2 - k7 k2tog x 8 k4 k2tog r6 - k3 k2tog x 8 k2tog r3 - k6 k2tog x 8 k3 k2tog r7 - k2 k2tog x 8 k1 r4 - k5 k2tog x 8 k2 k2tog r8 - k1 k2tog x 8 k1 r9 - k2tog x 8 k1 9sts using a tapestry needle thread your yarn through the last over sts 7 8 9 and pull the yarn through to close the hat weave in the end part 5
